description: Demonstrates Bluemix DOcplexcloud service
name: Decision Optimization for Bluemix Getting Started sample
author: IBM

description: Optimization models, with different file types, for solution with CPLEX using DOcplexcloud.
name: Decision Optimisation with CPLEX samples
author: IBM

description: Optimisation models for solution with CP Optimiser using DOcplexcloud.
name: Decision Optimisation with CPO samples
author: IBM

description: OPL models, with different file types, for solution with CPLEX using DOcplexcloud.
name: Decision Optimisation with OPL-CPLEX samples
author: IBM

description: OPL models, with different file types, for solution with CP Optimiser using DOcplexcloud.
name: Decision Optimisation with OPL-CPO samples
author: IBM

description: Leverage the power of DOcplexcloud directly from your Microsoft Excel workbook.
name: DOcplexcloud Call from Excel
author: IBM

description: A desktop application using a Java client to iteratively solve a multi-model problem with a column generation algorithm. Bulk rolls of sheet metal are cut into rolls of different widths, minimizing the number of rolls that need to be sliced.
name: DOcplexcloud Cutting Stock Java Sample
author: IBM

description: A web application that demonstrates how to solve a transportation optimization problem, integrating the IBM DOcplexcloud Java client with data stored in MongoDB and using a web front end developed with AngularJS.
name: DOcplexcloud GreenTruck sample
author: IBM

description: This sample shows how to use the DOcplexcloud parallel solve feature (only available with a Reserved Bare Metal subscription).
name: DOcplexcloud parallel solve sample
author: IBM

description: These samples demonstrate how to use the Python Client to submit a problem to the IBM Decision Optimization on Cloud service.
name: DOcplexcloud Python client samples
author: IBM

description: A desktop application that demonstrates how to solve a transportation optimization problem, integrating the IBM DOcplexcloud Java client with a simple Java application where data and results are streamed back and forth.
name: DOcplexcloud Trucking Java sample
author: IBM

description: These samples demonstrate how to use the DOcplex library to model and solve optimization problems.
name: Decision Optimization Modeling for Python (DOcplex) samples
author: IBM

description: The R client to submit optimization problems to the IBM Decision Optimization on Cloud service.
name: DOplexcloud R client
author: IBM

description: This shiny app shows how the IBM Data Science Experience was leveraged to show the results of a car accident predictive model in New York City, then compute the optimal locations for prepositionning ambulances.
name: DOcplexcloud R predict accident sample
author: IBM

description: Complex Project Scheduling. Requires you increase memory allocated to Decision Optimization Runtime Environment.
name: DO for DSX Complex Project Scheduling example
author: IBM

description: According to the expected revenue per customer and campaign, optimize selected campaign/customer.
name: DO for DSX Marketing Campaigns optimization example
author: IBM

description: According to the expected demand for different hospital departments, nurses are assigned to shifts.
name: DO for DSX Nurses example
author: IBM

description: According to some given demand for some products on some markets, decide which products to manufacture at which plant and for which markets.
name: DO for DSX Supply Demand example
author: IBM

description: According to the operations skills and distance between operations, optimize technician dispatching.
name: DO for DSX Technician Dispatching example
author: IBM

description: Assign territories to SalesReps taking into account customer expected revenue, salesrep capacity and minimizing travelling distance or disruption.
name: DO for DSX Territory Assignment example
author: IBM

description: According to the expected load over time, optimize electricity production between different units.
name: DO for DSX Unit Comitment example
author: IBM

description: This sample demonstrates how to use the IBM Decision Optimization Modeling with OPL custom data source .net API to import data from a data source into an OPL model.
name: OPL .NET Custom data source sample
author: IBM

description: This sample demonstrates how to use the IBM Decision Optimization Modeling with OPL custom data source API to import data from a JDBC data source into an OPL model.
name: OPL JDBC Custom data source sample
author: IBM
